body_html:
I think we can write a custom data reader, that reads data from HDFS, which seems doable: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/how_tos/new_data_formats/index.html

Any plan for this? I might be able to help with implementation.
body_text:
I think we can write a custom data reader, that reads data from HDFS, which seems doable: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/how_tos/new_data_formats/index.html
Any plan for this? I might be able to help with implementation.
body:
I think we can write a custom data reader, that reads data from HDFS, which seems doable: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/how_tos/new_data_formats/index.html

Any plan for this? I might be able to help with implementation.
